requirements.build_summary: This project is defined as a 7-inch Long Range platform, engineered for endurance and reliability. The build will utilize a professional-grade carbon fiber frame. The power system is specified for 6S Li-Ion battery packs (e.g., 4000mAh) to maximize flight time. Key mission equipment includes a GPS module for return-to-home and navigation capabilities. The build standard is 'Ruggedized Professional,' mandating stainless steel hardware, full TPU protective prints for sensitive components, and M3 heat-set inserts for all 3D printed part fastening. Wiring will adhere to a direct-solder standard with braided mesh sleeving for abrasion resistance and professional cable management.

buy_list.search_query: 7 inch Long Range Carbon Fiber Drone Frame Kit

buy_list.reason: Efficient bi-blade design optimized for long-range flight on 7-inch platforms.
High-performance digital video system suitable for professional long-range builds.

buy_list.search_query: HGLRC M100 M10 GPS with Compass
buy_list.reason: Required for Return-to-Home and navigation capabilities, critical for long-range missions.
Long-range control link is mandatory for this build's mission profile.
Required for 6S power systems to absorb voltage spikes and protect electronics.

buy_list.search_query: M3x8mm socket head cap screws stainless steel
buy_list.reason: Required to mount motors to 6mm arms (allows 2mm thread grip), stainless for durability.

buy_list.search_query: M3 flight controller vibration damping gummies and standoff kit
buy_list.reason: Isolates the gyro from frame vibrations for clean flight performance.

buy_list.search_query: M3x5mm brass heat set inserts for 3D printing
buy_list.reason: Mandated by 'Ruggedized Professional' standard for securing all 3D printed parts.

buy_list.search_query: Amass XT60 Male Connector with 12AWG Silicone Wire
buy_list.reason: Standard connector for 6S battery packs of this size.
Required for printing durable, impact-resistant protective parts.

buy_list.search_query: FPV drone building kit (Blue Loctite, VHB tape, zip ties, heatshrink)
buy_list.reason: Essential consumables required for a secure and professional assembly.

buy_list.search_query: 3mm braided mesh cable sleeving and 14AWG silicone wire
buy_list.reason: Mandated by 'Wiring Standard' for abrasion resistance and professional cable management.

print_list.design_requirements: Mount for DJI O3 camera, M3 heat-set insert holes for fastening, integrated vibration damping.
Rear-mounted holder for GPS module and VTX/Receiver antennas, M3 heat-set insert holes.
Protective guards for the ends of each arm, doubles as soft motor mount.

specs.engineering_notes: Bill of Materials configured for a ruggedized 7-inch long-range platform. Key choices include low-kV 2806.5 motors for 6S efficiency, M3 stainless hardware for durability, and mandatory TPU prints with heat-set inserts to meet the professional build standard. All components selected for endurance and reliability.

assembly.guide_md:
# Assembly Instructions: Rekon7 Long Range Drone

## 1. Preparation
Before starting, ensure you have the following tools:
- Soldering Iron (with a suitable tip)
- Hex Drivers (primarily M3 for this build)
- Wire cutters and strippers
- Pliers

## 2. Frame & Motor Assembly
First, assemble the main plates and arms of the Rekon7 frame. Mount the **BrotherHobby Avenger 2806.5** motors onto the ends of each arm using the 19x19mm M3 mounting holes. Route the motor wires towards the center of the frame along the arms.

## 3. Electronics Installation
Install the **SkyStars Fly Stack** onto the frame's central 30.5x30.5mm mounting pattern. Place the KO60 60A ESC board first, followed by the F722 HD Pro 3 FC on top. Use the provided grommets and connect the two boards with the included wiring harness. Ensure the orientation arrow on the FC points towards the front of the drone.

## 4. Wiring
Trim the motor wires to an appropriate length to reach the ESC pads. Solder the three wires from each motor to the corresponding M1, M2, M3, and M4 pads on the KO60 ESC. The exact wire order can be adjusted in software later, but consistent soldering makes it easier.

## 5. Configuration Tip
When you connect the flight controller to your computer, use the Betaflight Configurator. The correct firmware target for your **SkyStars F722 HD Pro 3** is `SKYSTARSF7HDPRO`.

steps.detail: Assemble the Rekon7 frame and mount the BrotherHobby Avenger 2806.5 motors using the 19x19mm M3 pattern on the arms.
Install the SkyStars KO60 ESC and F722 FC onto the central 30.5x30.5mm mounting posts.
Solder the motor wires to the corresponding motor pads on the KO60 ESC board.
Secure the HQ Prop 7x4.5x2 propellers to the motors after configuration, ensuring correct rotation.
In Betaflight Configurator, flash the flight controller using the 'SKYSTARSF7HDPRO' firmware target.
